ch0145_00_pod/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! You kept me
waiting long enough!
ch0145_00_pod/7101_0701_01_10:
At first I thought with my skill, I could be the
best on Pasio.
ch0145_00_pod/7101_0701_02_10:
But everyone here is so strong. I should’ve
expected that, since Trainers from all over
the world gather here.
ch0145_00_pod/7101_0701_03_10:
Let’s compete to see which of us can first be
Pasio’s best!
ch0145_00_pod/7102_0701_01_10:
My body springs into action much faster than
my mind.
ch0145_00_pod/7102_0701_02_10: So I don’t strategize much while battling.
ch0145_00_pod/7102_0701_03_10:
Just go for it—all or nothing! That’s how it
feels!
ch0145_00_pod/7103_0701_01_10:
Cilan and Cress are probably struggling here
on Pasio with all these strong Trainers.
ch0145_00_pod/7103_0701_02_10:
As the strongest of us three, I’ve got to make
sure to cover for them when they need it!
ch0145_00_pod/7103_0701_03_10: When the time comes, you’ll help too, right?
ch0145_00_pod/7104_0701_01_10: Fire’s more important to me than anything!
ch0145_00_pod/7104_0701_02_10:
As long as you keep your heart’s flame
alive, you can keep pushing forward,
no matter how hard it gets!
ch0145_00_pod/7104_0701_03_10:
When you’re feeling down, I’ll share my fire
with you!
ch0145_00_pod/7105_0701_01_10:
I always thought you and I were
opposite types of people,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0145_00_pod/7105_0701_02_10:
But you’ve got a bonfire burning deep in
your eyes and heart!
ch0145_00_pod/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! I wanted to give you this.
ch0145_00_pod/1701_0702_01_10:
It’ll definitely be handy, so make sure you
use it!
ch0145_00_pod/2501_0701_01_10:
Of my brothers and I, I’m usually the one to
take the lead.
ch0145_00_pod/2501_0701_02_10: But sometimes I get ahead of myself.
ch0145_00_pod/2501_0701_03_10:
When that happens, my brothers help me.
We strike a good balance!
ch0145_00_pod/2501_0702_01_10:
I’m happy to have siblings who bring out the
best in me!
ch0145_00_pod/2501_0702_02_10:
I hope you and I can do that for each
other, too!
ch0145_00_pod/2511_0701_01_10:
In order to become a full-fledged
Gym Leader, I need a big heart!
ch0145_00_pod/2511_0701_02_10:
I need to be able to accept my challengers
for who they are!
ch0145_00_pod/2511_0701_03_10:
It’ll be hard, but someday, I’ll make it
happen!
ch0145_00_pod/2511_0702_01_10:
When I’m a full-fledged Gym Leader, you
should come challenge me!
ch0145_00_pod/2511_0702_02_10:
I’ll battle you with everything I’ve got—and
show you a totally new me!
ch0145_00_pod/3001_0701_01_10:
When the morning comes, I just naturally
wake up! It’s the same for you, too, right?
ch0145_00_pod/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m at my best around this time of
day—when I can really start feeling
the heat!
ch0145_00_pod/3005_0701_01_10:
*yawn* I’m kinda sleepy... I guess that’s all
the adventuring I’ll be doing today.
